altereddamage-fabric.duskconfig.title: Altered Damage Config
altereddamage-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_pre: When enabled, does not change the damage output if it would be fatal with the modifier and not fatal without. Prevents dying from for example poison and starvation.
altereddamage-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_alt: If enabled, modifies the damage another entity receives by the global modifier.
If enabled, modifies the damage a player receives by the global modifier.
altereddamage-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ent: The global damage modifier for other entities.
altereddamage-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_pla: The global damage modifier for players.
